# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a map annotation that shows a title string at a point on a map.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a Point Annotation

- **init(coordinate:)**: Creates a point annotation at the specified coordinate on the map.
- **init(coordinate:title:subtitle:)**: Creates a point annotation displaying a title and subtitle string at the specified coordinate on the map.

items.description: Creates a point annotation at the specified coordinate on the map.
items.name: init(coordinate:)

items.description: Creates a point annotation displaying a title and subtitle string at the specified coordinate on the map.
